mapper.insert: insert into mycgv_board (bid,btitle,bcontent,bhits,id,bdate,bfile,bsfile) values ('b_'||ltrim(to_char(sequ_mycgv_board_bid.nextval,'0000')),#{btitle},#{bcontent}, 0,#{id},sysdate,#{bfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bsfile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select rno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, bdate from (select rownum rno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, to_char(bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bdate from (select bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, bdate from mycgv_board order by bdate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select rownum rno, bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, to_char(bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') bdate from (select bid, btitle, bcontent, bhits, id, bdate from mycgv_board order by bdate desc)
mapper.update: update mycgv_board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bid=#{bid}
update mycgv_board set bhits=bhits+1 where bid=#{bid}
